## 1. Summary
Provide a clear and concise overview of the change.

## 2. Motivation
Why is this change required?  
How does it improve clarity, performance, or architecture?

## 3. Implementation Details
Short technical description of the modifications:
- What was added  
- What was removed  
- What was refactored  

## 4. Related Issues
Reference using GitHub format:  
- Closes #ID  
- Fixes #ID  

## 5. Testing
Describe tests performed and results.

## 6. Checklist
- [ ] Code is minimal, clean, and aligned with CCG standards  
- [ ] All linting and formatting checks pass  
- [ ] All tests pass  
- [ ] No unnecessary files or changes  
- [ ] Documentation updated where required
